com.layers.app.business

Interface LiquorBusinessInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LiquorBusinessService

    public interface LiquorBusinessInterface
    Contracts the respective business service for dependency injection. Guarentees its functions are provided and the business logic checked exceptions are implemented.
    See Also:
    LiquorBusinessService
